scripts.quicktype-java: rm -rf target/java ; export DIR=$PWD/.. ; mkdir -p target/java/src/main/java/org/finos/fo ; cp pom.template.xml target/java/pom.xml ; cd target/java/src/main/java/org/finos/fo ; quicktype $DIR/src/objects/* --lang java --package org.finos.fo -o .
scripts.quicktype-python: rm -rf target/python ; export DIR=$PWD/.. ; mkdir -p target/python ; quicktype $DIR/src/objects/* --lang python -o target/python/financial-objects.py
scripts.quicktype-cs: rm -rf target/cs ; export DIR=$PWD/.. ; mkdir -p target/cs ; quicktype $DIR/src/objects/* --lang cs --namespace Finos.FinancialObjects -o target/cs/FinancialObjects.cs
